ValidationRule.description: Requires that the RT Audio Service level to be Operator-Assisted Premium when the event is InterCall and a participant list is included.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "InterCall"), (Participant_list_included__c = TRUE), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Operator Assisted Audio")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: InterCall events with participant lists can only have an Audio Type of Operator Assisted Premium.
